Package angryflappybird

Class AngryFlappyBird

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
angryflappybird.AngryFlappyBird
public class AngryFlappyBird extends javafx.application.Application
The user collects eggs while avoiding pigs and pipes white egg: add 5 points gold egg: auto pilot mode for 6 seconds 3 lives total the bird should not collide with pigs, pipes, and floor
Launches the application, prepares the application scene and implements the animation of the objects on the scene.
Author:
Team Flappy; Yerim, Ayesha, Manasvi

      set UI for game control
      set RadioButton for difficulty levels of the game

    • mouseClickHandler

      private void mouseClickHandler(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      the method handles the effect of click on startButton
      Parameters:
      e - the user clicked with the mouse

    • resetGameScene

      void resetGameScene(boolean firstEntry)
      the method resets all the flags and game parameters
      set backgrounds and levels for the game
      set score and lives label on the game scene
      initialize floor, bird, pipes, pigs, and eggs
      Parameters:
      firstEntry - flag that keeps track if the game is started for first time or continued after a lost life/pause. If it is true, a new canvas is created and added to graphics context and the gameScene holds the background and the canvas on which the blob and floor will appear

    • handle

      public void handle(long now)
      the method sets the current scene when the game starts
      Parameters:
      now - time related attributes of the game.
